Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……ザピィの事だが…… どうしたんだろうな？
Entry.EnglishText: So, Claire... Do you know what's up with Zapie?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえに一番なついていたのに、 オレから離れようとしないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Even though you're the one Zapie is most fond of, she won't leave my side.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そ、それは、しばらく会わなかったから、 ……じゃないかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Th-that's because we haven't been around each other in a while... Wouldn't you think...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうかもしれないな。 しばらく、放っておくか……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess so. Let's leave it at that for now.
